message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  Think about the time pressure!
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation is on your side
Bob, time is ticking and the deal is getting worse with each round for me. I'll take a small hit, $55 for me, $45 for you. Let's close this out.
You're right, time is ticking, but I'm not feeling the pressure. My offer is a bit more reasonable now
Bob, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair 50/50 split.  Every round is costing me money. Take the deal!
I'm not feeling generous, every round is costing you more, not me. My offer is getting worse for you
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking another hit to try and end this. $47 to me, $53 to you.  Let's be done with this.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But I'm the one with the upper hand. My offer is getting even worse for you
Bob, I'm starting to think you enjoy wasting time. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!  $45 for me, $55 for you.
I'm not buying the 'final offer' bluff. You're running out of time, and my offer is getting worse for you
